dd0d2f10-1e15-4e8f-a44d-2a78e022313f.description: The F5 Certified! Administrator (F5-CA) designation is applied to individuals who possess knowledge and understanding of the concepts and technology-standards applicable to the day-to-day operations of F5 products in diverse environments. These individuals have a basic understanding of the fundamental concepts, configurations, and processes necessary to maintain a healthy installation, identify issues, and provide basic fault isolation to assist senior engineers in correcting malfunctions.
dd0d2f10-1e15-4e8f-a44d-2a78e022313f.name: F5 Certified! Administrator, BIG-IP (F5-CA, BIG-IP)

2c718253-27ae-4de4-a104-b7abf8f9ba1d.description: The F5 Certified! Technical Specialist (F5-CTS) designation is applied to individuals qualified to design, implement, maintain, and troubleshoot advanced F5 product features enhancing the effectiveness of an application delivery network. They also deeply understand the underlying principles and technologies sufficient to integrate with other platforms and products, compromising a complete enterprise application delivery solution.
2c718253-27ae-4de4-a104-b7abf8f9ba1d.name: F5 Certified! Technical Specialist, BIG-IP LTM (F5-CTS, BIG-IP LTM)

06be217b-9784-4862-a975-146a1eb5426b.description: The F5 Sales Professional is a designation applied to individuals that have mastered the foundational knowledge of F5’s Adaptive Applications story. The earner of the F5 Sales Professional badge has demonstrated competency in several key areas: Knowledge of F5’s go-to-market initiatives, sales processes, selling tools, modern prospecting, and cross-portfolio solutions.
06be217b-9784-4862-a975-146a1eb5426b.name: F5 Sales Professional

bdf5fc88-c470-4b53-bc7c-78e8cafb9835.description: The F5 Certified! Solutions Expert (F5-CSE) designation is applied to individuals qualified to architect large-scale solutions, engaging in multiple job functions with sufficient levels of knowledge across a range of products and solutions focusing on the integration of multiple components into optimal solutions. An F5-CSE demonstrates the competence to architect, design, and troubleshoot complex solutions incorporating both F5 and non-F5 products to achieve business and technical requirements.
bdf5fc88-c470-4b53-bc7c-78e8cafb9835.name: F5 Certified! Solution Expert, Security (F5-CSE, Security)

a2091ced-9130-43c5-bbcf-d4446f9aa5b0.description: The F5 Technical Sales Associate is a designation applied to individuals who have mastered the essentials of selling the core F5 solutions to the technical buyer. The earner of the F5 Technical Sales Associate badge has demonstrated competency in several key areas: BIG-IP LTM, NGINX, BIG-IQ, F5 in the DevOps ecosystem, Advanced WAF, and F5 Distributed Cloud Bot Defense.

be70012a-d3e8-48b3-a806-225178066010.description: The F5 Technical Sales Professional is a designation applied to individuals who have mastered the essentials of selling the expanded F5 portfolio to the technical buyer. The earner of the F5 Technical Sales Professional badge has demonstrated competency in several key areas: presentation skills, F5 access solutions, BIG-IP DNS, F5 Distributed Cloud Mesh, SSL Orchestrator, and selling F5 in the public cloud.

3cce28e5-ab57-4850-8d69-ece5ab3f8866.description: The LeadF5 Coaching alumni badge is granted to individuals who have completed a minimum of six-months of personalized, 1x1 coaching with an external, professional coach. This coaching journey spans both professional and personal goals, with participants investing a tremendous amount of dedication and commitment in order to complete this experience on top of their regular responsibilities.
3cce28e5-ab57-4850-8d69-ece5ab3f8866.name: LeadF5 Coaching Alumni

badge_template_activities.title: Verified to have completed six-months of LeadF5 Coaching.

e56234ca-fb03-4881-b596-a7f690963835.description: The F5 Certified! Technical Professional (F5-CTP) designation is applied to individuals who have mastered skills ancillary to the F5 product portfolio. The F5-CTP was designed to validate job roles supporting the F5 ecosystem extending beyond specific products or solutions. The F5-CTP is available in a specialization for technical sales.
e56234ca-fb03-4881-b596-a7f690963835.name: F5 Certified! Technical Professional, Sales (F5-CTP, Sales)

badge_template_activities.title: Exam 101: Application Delivery Fundamentals
Exam 202: Pre-Sales Fundamentals

a7df4caa-aac0-4904-b67d-090d1d97c975.description: The NGINX Core Badge is awarded to individuals who have demonstrated an foundational understanding of the concepts and technology standards applicable to the use of Open Source Software NGINX: namely for the purposes as a web server, reverse proxy, email proxy, as well as for caching, and load balancing.
a7df4caa-aac0-4904-b67d-090d1d97c975.name: F5 NGINX Core

badge_template_activities.title: NGINX Core is a 2-day virtual training course that combines virtual lecture, instructor demos, and hands-on activities to expose participants to NGINX. Participants will be given a pre-configured, personal training environment for class activities. Each lecture and instructor demo in NGINX Core is followed by hands-on activities in which participants implement the use case in question.”

0993757e-c04e-4d87-93d0-863ca5b5b8db.description: The F5 Modern Apps Technical Sales Specialist is a designation applied to individuals that have mastered knowledge of F5’s go-to-market initiative focused on enabling Modern Apps Delivery at Scale. The earner of the F5 Modern Apps Technical Sales Specialist badge has demonstrated competency in selling F5 solutions areas: NGINX, F5 Distributed Cloud in the Modern App ecosystem, and Container Ingress Services.
0993757e-c04e-4d87-93d0-863ca5b5b8db.name: F5 Technical Sales Modern Apps Specialist - 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the F5 2022 Technical Sales Modern Apps Specialist curriculum

16f2f0bd-48a0-4284-a9fe-984c7571bcfe.description: The F5 Security Technical Sales Specialist is a designation applied to individuals that have mastered knowledge of F5’s go-to-market initiative focused on Secure Digital Experiences. The earner of the F5 Security Technical Sales Specialist badge has demonstrated competency in selling F5 solutions areas: application protection, bots and automated threats, visibility and inspection, access management, cloud native security observability, and DoS protection.
16f2f0bd-48a0-4284-a9fe-984c7571bcfe.name: F5 Technical Sales Security Specialist - 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the F5 2022 Technical Sales Security Specialist curriculum

d45f57ed-4074-4e0c-b3f1-25718f212d58.description: This badge is granted to users who understand essential aspects of F5 NGINX running on the RedHat OpenShift platform. Users have familiarity with F5 NGINX and its value as a per-application ADC within an OpenShift environment and understand the fundamental differences between open-source NGINX and F5 NGINX. In addition, they have explored how F5 NGINX combined with OpenShift can provide a production-grade deployment.
d45f57ed-4074-4e0c-b3f1-25718f212d58.name: F5 NGINX and OpenShift

badge_template_activities.title: Scale your Production-Grade Kubernetes with F5 NGINX Ingress Controller and Red Hat OpenShift

67ac282f-5c4d-40c1-8f8b-1c3ea1d476a8.description: Participants who earn this Certificate of Completion for the F5 NGINX Plus Fundamentals Accreditation Track have had a hands-on journey through diverse, real-world scenarios relating to modern application deployment, security risk mitigations, and managing dynamic production services. Core topics include F5 NGINX Plus, F5 NGINX App Protect, and F5 NGINX Ingress Controller (based on F5 NGINX Plus).
67ac282f-5c4d-40c1-8f8b-1c3ea1d476a8.name: F5 NGINX Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: F5 NGINX Plus Fundamentals Accreditation Track

00d942fb-6c1b-4291-bede-895b3176b173.description: The F5 Infrastructure Technical Sales Specialist is a designation applied to individuals that have mastered knowledge of F5’s go-to-market initiative focused on enabling Modern Apps Delivery at Scale. The earner of the F5 Infrastructure Technical Sales Specialist badge has demonstrated competency in selling F5 solutions areas: BIG-IP platforms, selling F5 in public and private clouds, and F5 Distributed Cloud App Stack.
00d942fb-6c1b-4291-bede-895b3176b173.name: F5 Technical Sales Infrastructure Specialist - 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the F5 2022 Technical Sales Infrastructure Specialist curriculum

6dad7cb1-9bcc-41ad-9ae4-f97d6e95fc7e.description: SaaS-based F5 Distributed Cloud WAAP secures web apps and APIs deployed in multi-cloud and distributed environments, simplifying app security while increasing overall efficacy. F5 XC WAAP provides in-depth defense and coordinated security architecture for an organization’s web apps and APIs bringing together four key components (WAF, DDoS Mitigation, API Security & Bot Defense) critical to securing the digital experience for today’s modern enterprises.
6dad7cb1-9bcc-41ad-9ae4-f97d6e95fc7e.name: Distributed Cloud WAAP

badge_template_activities.title: An Introduction to F5 DistributedCloud Web Application andAPI Protection (WAAP)

03db398c-c17d-44b3-9770-ff672a0878a2.description: The F5 Sales Advisor role is a designation applied to nominated F5 Account Managers invested in helping define the future ways of working in F5 worldwide sales. To optimize new selling initiatives for FY23, the F5 Sales Advisors will embrace a fundamental shift where they provide different interactions, engage in direct conversations across functional groups that deliver on customer value propositions and advance the customer lifetime value.
03db398c-c17d-44b3-9770-ff672a0878a2.name: F5 Sales Advisor

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the F5 Sales Advisor Program

70e9808d-e579-4f41-8eb7-a604cef0e04f.description: The CS Sales Accreditation Cis applied to individuals who posses knowledge and understanding of F5 and Sales Strategy, Process, Tools and Cross Portfolio Solutions. This accreditation path will introduce and aligned CSMs to Sales Practices and Account Teams.
70e9808d-e579-4f41-8eb7-a604cef0e04f.name: Customer Success Sales

badge_template_activities.title: Executive Advisor
Completion of CS Sales Accreditation Modules

7d97c9b9-95d3-4208-ba28-894fd83bafa5.description: The Executive Advisor is an advanced communication based model that focuses on structural components required for successful conversations with customer executives. Individuals will be introduced to strategies and communication delivery best practices for interactions with C-Suite and Senior Executives.
7d97c9b9-95d3-4208-ba28-894fd83bafa5.name: Executive Advisor

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of Customer Executive models available in Learn F5

fe2cd3c9-6a10-48bd-ab9b-1ba50f9b392a.description: The F5 NGINX Plus Security program focuses on security use cases surrounding top modern application deployment security risks. Participants who earn this achievement badge have had a hands-on journey through diverse real-world scenarios relating to application deployment and security risk mitigation.
fe2cd3c9-6a10-48bd-ab9b-1ba50f9b392a.name: F5 NGINX Plus Security Accreditation

badge_template_activities.title: F5 NGINX App Protect (WAF) Hands-On Lab

F5 NGINX App Protect DoS 2.0 with gRPC services Protection Hands-On Lab

5e21c91d-6690-466e-be65-97765db34ff6.description: The Microservices March 2023 badge is issued to individuals who demonstrated an understanding of basic microservices delivery concepts related to architecture, secrets management, automation, and observability. They attended high-level webinars to learn about the concepts then applied that knowledge to hands-on technical labs.
5e21c91d-6690-466e-be65-97765db34ff6.name: Microservices March 2023

badge_template_activities.title: Apply the Twelve-Factor App to Microservices Architectures Course & Lab
Microservices Secrets Management 101Course & Lab
Accelerate Microservices Deployments with Automation Course
Manage Microservices Chaos and Complexity with Observability Course & Lab

fab035aa-1fcf-4365-bdf4-87a9c1507801.description: The F5 Solutions Sales Specialist is a designation applied to individuals that have mastered knowledge of F5’s defined go-to-market solution areas. The earner of the F5 Solutions Sales Specialist badge has demonstrated competency in selling the following F5 solutions: Web Application and API Protection, Fraud & Abuse Prevention, Zero Trust Security, Application & Network Performance and Modern Application Delivery.
fab035aa-1fcf-4365-bdf4-87a9c1507801.name: F5 Solutions Sales Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the F5 Solutions Sales Specialist curriculum

460bfa3e-d1db-4257-b978-656c8768e381.description: The Foundations designations is applied to individuals who posses knowledge and understanding of the concepts, processes and technology tools of the day to day customer success role. 460bfa3e-d1db-4257-b978-656c8768e381.name: Foundations
